text: Patricia Bernal (born 27 October 1961) is a Mexican actress. She is known for her roles in telenovelas such as Pobre rico, pobre. Her son, Gael Garc√≠a Bernal, is a Golden Globe Award-winning actor. She appeared in the movies Everybody Loves Somebody, La boda de mi mejor amigo and New Order. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:People from Sinaloa
title: Patricia Bernal
